name: Slimezone (Delta-sama)
description:
Credits:
Game was made by Maxim Dobrivskiy, 101290100

How to Play:
Move with WASD. Walk through tall grass to fight with a random slime.
Go to portal to fight a slime of a corresponding nature (red is Fire, yellow is Thunder, deep blue is Water, light blue is Wind)
Each nature has its strengths and weaknesses. Fire beats wind, wind beats thunder, thunder beats water, water beats fire. Use a superior's nature spells to deal maximum damage!
Change your own nature during the battle by casting a nature shield. You possess only shields of your captured slimes' natures.
Slimes can learn during the battle and remember the results of their attacks. Moreover, some slimes are smarter than others. Fool them by changing your nature by using Shields! However, the smartest slimes can even notice your nature changing and react on that!
Absorb the beaten slime after the fight! Slime absorption gives you one of it's spells. Some spells are common, and some are incredibly rare!
Some spells can apply different battle effects on you and your opponent, so keep track of the battle effect icons near the health bars.

Warning:
Game is not balanced yet!

Cheats:
[K] - kill the enemy on the next move
[L] - die on the next move
